movies.title: The Pumpkin Karver
movies.plot: It's Halloween in West Minister, and teenager Lynn Starks is attacked by a man wearing a pumpkin face mask in the basement of her house. Her younger brother Jonathan is carving a pumpkin in the kitchen and hears her sister crying for help. He uses the knife to protect his sister, stabbing the assaulter. When they take the mask off his face, they realize that the man is Lynn's boyfriend Alec, playing a prank on Lynn. One year later, the siblings move to Carver, and they are invited to a Halloween party in the field. Lynn introduces her friend Tammy to her brother, who is haunted by Alec, and Jonathan stays with Tammy. However, her former boyfriend Lance bullies Jonathan along the night. Meanwhile, several youngsters are attacked by someone wearing a Pumpkin Face mask, carving their faces.
movies.simplePlot: It's Halloween in West Minister, and teenager Lynn Starks is attacked by a man wearing a pumpkin face mask in the basement of her house. Her younger brother Jonathan is carving a pumpkin in...

biography.bio: Michael Zara was born on January 2, 1980 in Scottsdale, Arizona, USA as Michael Taylor Zara. He is known for his work on Major Crimes (2012) and The Prostitunes: Hey, Psycho! (Do U Recycle?) (2016).
biography.name: Michael Zara

biography.bio: Amy Weber was born on July 2, 1970 in Peoria, Illinois, USA as Amy Marie Weber. She is an actress and producer, known for Port Charles (1997), Kolobos (1999) and The Pumpkin Karver (2006). She has been married to David Dginger since May 17, 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Amy Weber

biography.bio: Brian Kary is an actor, known for The Pumpkin Karver (2006), Passage to Zarahemla (2007) and Based on a True Story (2008).
biography.name: Brian Kary

biography.bio: Bryan Jamerson is an actor, known for The Pumpkin Karver (2006).
biography.name: Bryan Jamerson

biography.bio: David J. Wright is an actor, known for The Pumpkin Karver (2006), Distortion (2006) and An Exercise in Vigilance (2007).
biography.name: David J. Wright

biography.bio: Terrence Evans was born on June 20, 1934 in Los Angeles, California, USA as Terrence Horace Evans. He was an actor, known for Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991), The Texas Chainsaw Massacre (2003) and The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning (2006). He was married to Heidi. He died on August 7, 2015 in Burbank, California.
biography.name: Terrence Evans

biography.bio: Jonathan Conrad is an actor, known for The Pumpkin Karver (2006), The Geek Club (2009) and Blue Skied an' Clear (2008).
biography.name: Jonathan Conrad

biography.bio: Jared Show is an editor and actor, known for Bigfoot the Movie (2015), Bigfoot (2009) and The Pumpkin Karver (2006).
biography.name: Jared Show

biography.bio: David Austin grew up in a small town in Minnesota. He was inspired to be an actor at an early age by his great-grandfather George Irving, a very prominent actor and director of the early 20th century. As a child his interest in piano led him to win the Minnesota State Piano Competition, where he played at the Northrup Auditorium in front of 10,000 people. Fascinated by Bruce Lee, he trained hard to become a black belt at age 16 and went on to win many awards for performance demonstrations. Always into extreme sports, as a student in Santa Barbara,CA, he would often swim miles out into the ocean and surprise ships at sea with a visit. One swim out to an oil rig almost ended in tragedy when a storm broke out while he and his friend were swimming seven miles offshore. Miraculously they survived! This story was featured and re-enacted on the PAX television show It's a Miracle (1998) and also featured on Warren Miller's television show "Wild Survival". David completed principal photography on the WW II feature Lorelei, la sorcière du Pacifique (2005), in which he plays an earnest young Executive Officer on the USS Fleischer. The film broke a number of box-office records in Japan and is in negotiation for release in the U.S.
biography.name: David Austin

biography.bio: Mistie Adams is an actress, known for The Pumpkin Karver (2006), Hip-Hop Task Force (2005) and Studio (2007).
biography.name: Mistie Adams

biography.bio: Charity Shea was born on December 4, 1983 in Denver, Colorado, USA. She is an actress, known for Single Ladies (2011), The Best Years (2007) and Alpha Dog (2006).

biography.bio: Alex Weed was born on May 11, 1980 in Menlo Park, California, USA as Alexander Wilding Weed. He is an actor, known for Mix (2004), The Double Born (2008) and Horror High (2005). He is married to Fiona Gubelmann.
biography.name: Alex Weed
